quotes.quote: Be alert to give service. What counts a great deal in life is what we do for others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Great services are not canceled by one act or by one single error.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: While you are not able to serve men, how can you serve spirits [of the dead]?...While you do not know life, how can you know about death?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Sow good services; sweet remembrances will grow them.
quotes.author: Madame de Stael

quotes.quote: I've come to believe that each of us has a personal calling that's as unique as a fingerprint - and that the best way to succeed is to discover what you love and then find a way to offer it to others in the form of service, working hard, and also allowing the energy of the universe to lead you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Be silent as to services you have rendered, but speak of favours you have received.
quotes.author: Seneca
